xwikidoc.name: PanelWizard
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: $services.localization.render('panelwizard.panelwizard')
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity output="false"}} ## ## Redirect to force right and left panels layout ## #set ($mustRedirect = false) #set ($redirectQuery = '') #set ($redirectDoc = $doc.fullName) #set ($redirectMode = 'view') #if ($xwiki.exists('XWiki.AdminSheet')) ## The new administration interface, use XWiki.XWikiPreferences as the container document, and this as an included sheet #set ($currSpace = $request.getParameter('space')) #set ($redirectQuery = "$!{request.queryString}&forceLeftPanels=1&forceRightPanels=1§ion=Panels.PanelWizard&$!docvariant") #set ($redirectMode = 'admin') #if ($doc.name != 'XWikiPreferences' && $doc.name != 'WebPreferences') #set ($redirectDoc = 'XWiki.XWikiPreferences') #set ($mustRedirect = true) #end #else ## No admin application, use this as the container document #set ($redirectQuery = "$!{request.queryString}&forceLeftPanels=1&forceRightPanels=1&$!docvariant") #end #if (!$request.getParameter('forceLeftPanels') || !$request.getParameter('forceRightPanels')) #set ($mustRedirect = true) #end #if ($mustRedirect) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getDocument($redirectDoc).getURL($redirectMode, $redirectQuery))## #stop() #end ## No redirect needed, display the wizard #set ($showdata = 0) #set ($showEmptyPanels = 1) #if ("$!{currSpace}" != '') #set ($accessLevel = $xwiki.hasAccessLevel('admin', $xcontext.user, "${currSpace}.WebPreferences")) #else #set ($accessLevel = $xwiki.hasAdminRights()) #end ## ## Check for admin right for the current preferences document (XWiki.XWikiPreferences or Space.WebPreferences) ## {{/velocity}} {{velocity output="false"}} #macro (displayConfigPropertyValue $propName $action) #set ($output = $doc.display($propName, $action)) #set ($output = $stringtool.removeStart($output, '{{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}')) #set ($output = $stringtool.removeEnd($output, '{{/html}}')) $output #end #macro (displayPageLayoutSection)
$services.localization.render('panelwizard.choosepagelayout')
#set ($crtlayout = 0) #if ($showLeftPanels and $showLeftPanels == '1') #set ($crtlayout = $crtlayout + 1) #end #if ($showRightPanels and $showRightPanels == '1') #set ($crtlayout = $crtlayout + 2) #end
$services.localization.render('XWiki.XWikiPreferences_leftPanelsWidth.hint')
#displayConfigPropertyValue('leftPanelsWidth' 'edit')
$services.localization.render('XWiki.XWikiPreferences_leftPanels.hint')
#displayConfigPropertyValue('leftPanels' 'edit')
$services.localization.render('XWiki.XWikiPreferences_rightPanelsWidth.hint')
#displayConfigPropertyValue('rightPanelsWidth' 'edit')
$services.localization.render('XWiki.XWikiPreferences_rightPanels.hint')
#displayConfigPropertyValue('rightPanels' 'edit')
#end #macro (displayPanelListSection) (% id="draganddroptooltip" class="hastooltip noitems" title="${services.localization.render('panelwizard.tip')}"%)$services.localization.render('panelwizard.draganddrop')(%%) #set ($panelClass = $xwiki.getDocument('Panels.PanelClass').xWikiClass) #set ($categoryList = $panelClass.category.getProperty('values').value.split('[|]')) #set ($panelsList = $services.query.xwql('from doc.object(Panels.PanelClass) as panel where doc.fullName <> ''Panels.PanelTemplate''').execute()) #set ($categoryMap = {}) #foreach ($category in $categoryList) $!categoryMap.put($category, [])## #end #foreach ($item in $panelsList) ## stats panels can't be seen by non global admins #if ($xwiki.hasAccessLevel('view', $xcontext.user, $item)) #set ($obj = $xwiki.getDocument($item).getObject('Panels.PanelClass')) #if ($obj.type == 'view') #set ($arrayList = $categoryMap.get($obj.category)) #if ($arrayList) #set ($discard = $categoryMap.get($obj.category).add($item)) ## TODO: uncategorized? #end #end #end #end #set ($panelsPerRow = 3) (% id="dhtmltooltip" style="visibility: hidden;" %)((())) #if ($request.place) #set ($ajaxurl = $xwiki.getDocument('Panels.PanelLayoutUpdate').getURL('get', "xpage=plain&outputSyntax=plain&place=$!{escapetool.url($request.place)}&prefsdoc=${escapetool.url($currentDoc)}&form_token=${escapetool.url($services.csrf.getToken())}")) #else #set ($ajaxurl = $xwiki.getDocument("Panels.PanelLayoutUpdate").getURL('get', "xpage=plain&outputSyntax=plain&prefsdoc=${escapetool.url($currentDoc)}&form_token=${escapetool.url($services.csrf.getToken())}")) #end $xwiki.jsfx.use('js/xwiki/accordion/accordion.js')## $xwiki.jsfx.use('js/xwiki/panelwizard/Drag.js')## $xwiki.jsfx.use('js/xwiki/panelwizard/ieemu.js')## $xwiki.jsfx.use('js/xwiki/panelwizard/toolTip.js')## {{html}} {{/html}} $xwiki.jsfx.use('js/xwiki/panelwizard/panelWizard.js')## (% id="allviewpanels" %) ((( (% id="panellistaccordion" class="accordion" %) ((( #set ($panelCount = 0) #foreach ($category in $categoryList) ## start of accordion tab: (% class="accordionTabTitleBar" id="${category}_header" %) (((=${category}=))) ## start of accordion tab content: (% class="accordionTabContentBox" %) ((( #set ($categPanels = $categoryMap.get($category)) #if ($categPanels.size() == 0) (%class="noitems"%)$services.localization.render('panelwizard.nopanels')(%%) #else #foreach ($item in $categPanels) #set ($panelDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($item)) #set ($obj = $panelDoc.getObject('Panels.PanelClass')) (% class="panelitemc" %) ((( (% class="label" %)((($doc.display('name', $obj)))) (% id="panelContainer${panelCount}" class="panelcontainer" title="${doc.display('description', 'view', $obj, 'xwiki/2.0').replaceAll('^\{\{html(.*?)\}\}', '').replaceAll('\{\{/html\}\}$', '')}" %)(((#if($panelsStatus.get($item) == 'false')#displaypanel($item)#else(% class="panel" %)((()))#end))) (% class="xwikibuttonlink" %)((([[$services.localization.render('edit')>>path:$xwiki.getURL($item, 'inline')]] [[$services.localization.render('delete')>>path:$xwiki.getURL($item, 'delete')]]))) ))) #set ($panelCount = $panelCount + 1) #end## foreach panel #end## categPanels.size() )))## end of accordion tab content - accordionTabContentBox #end## foreach category )))## panellistaccordion )))## allviewpanels #end {{/velocity}} {{velocity}} {{html clean="false"}} #if ($accessLevel) #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('Panels.PanelWizard')) #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('Panels.PanelWizard'))
